alert.note: Alert for Butler; Sedgwick; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Sedgwick, central Butler and northern Sumner Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 530 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms scattered along a line extending from 15 miles west of Eureka to East Wichita to near Viola. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, El Dorado, Andover, Haysville, Augusta, Bel Aire, Mulvane, Rose Hill, Clearwater, Douglass, Towanda, Conway Springs, Benton, Leon, Downtown Wichita, Kechi, Eastborough, Viola and Eisenhower National Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 11. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 28 and 87. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
